section.title: Background
section.para: During the Scrum Gathering Shanghai 2010, xxx introduced CSD (Certificated Scrum Development) activities driven by Scrum Alliance, it is quite interesting topic, and this is exactly what I am trying to do in the company. Though I keep my comments on CSD as certification.
I have been in software development from 20 years ago, which I play basic language on Apple II, I didn't learn any process until coming to the company ??
Scrum is really good framework...
This book is better called "Exeperience Scrum with real java development"
Therefore I want to create this kind of materials to share with everyone and maybe it could be contributed to Scrum China Alliance.
This book will not tell you the details of each tool, but it will give you lead the students to know what it aims for and can be used during the training.

section.title: Language matters
section.para: Some people think the it doesn't matter which language ...
Java development is typical different on C/C++ development

section.title: Tool matters
section.para: Ant, maven will impact your daily work, svn,clearcase, git will impact your daily work as well

section.title: How to use the book
section.para: This book is used by teachers mainly and as a reference for the students, the teachers
The materials and five days' arrangement should be adapted for your target group based on their java competence.
Teachers act as product owner as well

section.title: Prerequisent?
section.para: most of them should have java development competence using eclipse, it is ok for one in each team has no experience on this, since we need tester in each team

section.title: Environment
section.para: <add a picture here>
Let's consider a typical 21 students' training, it will be divided into 3 teams from day 2.
every team will have a assistant or teacher and sit around the table
teams will compete with each other on same tasks for more fun. (the result could be quite different)
Review meeting will be done together, others are done seperated ??
The screen will show the quality (hudson/sonar) for every team

section.title: Hardware
section.para: One server is used to host the hudson, nexus, svn server, sonar, proxy server
Internet access should be provided in order to people to google for the sample codes
One big screen (or projector screen) is used to show the quality result
Whiteboard is used for planning and daily scrum standup meeting
Every student should bring own notebook (do we want to pair programming??)
Several reference books (Java Power Tools) should be provided for reference

section.title: Software
section.para: Eclipse with m2eclipse, ... maven, are packaged in advance

section.title: Day 1, Introduction and establish the agile environment
section.para: After the quick review of scrum (students should have scrum training already), the related java tools (continuous integration, version control system) will be introduced, and every student will install them by himself to experience it, though they will use pre-installed system for project development.
It aims to give deep understand how those tools work.

listitem.para: Quick introduction of Scrum and environment introduction
version control svn, eclipse setup, maven
lunch time, know more from each other and get feedback during relax time.
15 mintues break in end of this session
Quick review, summary, and the project introduction
